text: Joan Ann Hackett (March 1, 1934 â€“ October 8, 1983) was an American television, stage and movie actress. She played Dottie in the movie The Group (1966) with Candice Bergen. She played Joan Miller in the television series The Defenders (1961-65) Hackett was born in New York City. She died from ovarian cancer in Los Angeles. == Other websites == * Category:American television actors Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:Actors from New York City Category:1934 births Category:1983 deaths
title: Joan Hackett
